text: Anthoceros neesii is a species of hornwort in the Anthocerotaceae family. It is found in Austria, the Czech Republic, Germany, and Poland. Its natural habitat is unknown; today it is only found growing in crop fields.Bryophyte Specialist Group 2000. Anthoceros neesii. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2015.2. Downloaded on 30 August 2015. ==References== Category:Hornworts Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Anthoceros neesii
